title: Strategies for Enhancing Mathematical Thinking Using Open Educational Resources (OER)

context.prior_knowledge: Core mathematical concepts and practical application experience in relevant fields
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using OER (Open Educational Resources) to strengthen mathematical problem-solving competencies among practitioners

learning_goals: Learners analyze at least 10 math educational resources from OER platforms (e.g., Khan Academy, OpenStax) and write a critical evaluation report meeting at least three out of four criteria: educational suitability, accuracy, interactivity, and accessibility.
Complete at least three projects applying mathematical concepts to real-world scenarios by integrating Web 2.0 tools.
Propose at least two peer-reviewed and feedback-based improvement plans for OER content.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
